description.text: At 4th level, a prowler at world's end gains the bloodline power normally granted by his bloodline at 1st level. At 9th level, he gains the bloodline power normally granted by his bloodline at 4th level. At 12th level, he gains the bloodline power normally granted by his bloodline at 8th level. At 15th level, he gains the bloodline power normally granted by his bloodline at 12th level. At 20th level, he gains the bloodline power normally granted by his bloodline at 16th level.
